title: [Reim Fortress, Heart]
description: The heart of the fortress is fed by four connecting passageways from the north, south, east, and west.  A glowing pylon perched on an elaborately carved stone platform emits a low hum that reverberates throughout the entire fortress.  Tendrils of viridian light spill from the crystal mechanism and snake through the air down all four corridors.
paths: Obvious exits: north, east, south, west
